definition: A condition characterized by the involuntary leakage of urine, typically occurring due to weakened bladder muscles or other underlying medical conditions. It is commonly used to describe a medical condition related to urinary incontinence.

examples.german: Blasenschwäche ist ein häufiges Problem bei älteren Menschen.
examples.english: Urinary incontinence is a common problem in older people.

examples.german: Frauen sind häufiger von Blasenschwäche betroffen als Männer.
examples.english: Women are more likely to experience urinary incontinence than men.

examples.german: Blasenschwäche kann durch verschiedene Faktoren verursacht werden.
examples.english: Urinary incontinence can be caused by various factors.

examples.german: Es gibt verschiedene Behandlungsmöglichkeiten für Blasenschwäche.
examples.english: There are various treatment options for urinary incontinence.
Urinary incontinence can affect the quality of life.
